Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.mqtt.config

Class MqttConfiguration

java.lang.Object
pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.mqtt.config.MqttConfiguration
@Configuration public class MqttConfiguration extends Object
Bean configuration for inbound and outbound MQTT clients.

    • mqttPahoClientFactory

      @Bean public org.springframework.integration.mqtt.core.MqttPahoClientFactory mqttPahoClientFactory(MqttClientSettings settings)
      Configure the MqttPahoClientFactory instance.
      Parameters:
      settings - the MQTT client connection settings
      Returns:
      the client factory

    • mqttChannelAdapter

      @Bean public org.springframework.integration.mqtt.inbound.MqttPahoMessageDrivenChannelAdapter mqttChannelAdapter(MqttClientSettings settings, org.springframework.integration.mqtt.core.MqttPahoClientFactory clientFactory)
      Configure the MqttPahoMessageDrivenChannelAdapter to handle inbound MQTT messages from the root topic and device subtopics. The client ID ends with a '-rx' suffix.
      Parameters:
      settings - the MQTT client connection settings
      clientFactory - the client factory
      Returns:
      the channel adapter for inbound messages

    • mqttInbound

      @Bean public org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlow mqttInbound(org.springframework.integration.mqtt.inbound.MqttPahoMessageDrivenChannelAdapter adapter)

      Configure the IntegrationFlow for inbound MQTT messages.

      The root topic messages are routed to the 'root' channel, while the device subtopic messages are routed to 'device-in'. The incoming messages are assumed to have valid JSON payloads.

      Parameters:
      adapter - the channel adapter for inbound messages
      Returns:
      the integration flow for inbound messages

    • mqttOutbound

      @Bean public org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandler mqttOutbound(MqttClientSettings settings, org.springframework.integration.mqtt.core.MqttPahoClientFactory mqttPahoClientFactory)
      Configure the MqttPahoMessageHandler for sending MQTT messages. The client ID ends with a '-tx' suffix.
      Parameters:
      settings - the MQTT client connection settings
      mqttPahoClientFactory - the client factory
      Returns:
      the outbound message handler

    • mqttRootTopicFlow

      @Bean public org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlow mqttRootTopicFlow(RootTopicHandler rootTopicHandler, org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandler mqttOutbound)
      Configure the integration flow for incoming root topic messages. Outbound messages are converted to JSON.
      Parameters:
      rootTopicHandler - the root topic message handler
      mqttOutbound - the outbound message handler
      Returns:
      the root topic integration flow

    • mqttDeviceTopicFlow

      @Bean public org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlow mqttDeviceTopicFlow(DeviceTopicHandler deviceTopicHandler)
      Configure the integration flow for incoming device subtopic messages.
      Parameters:
      deviceTopicHandler - the device topic message handler
      Returns:
      the device topic integration flow
